Handle errors from ElasticSearch

es_error_handler.Rd

Errors from ElasticSearch are returned by package 'elastic' as text. This function will take the error condition and take appropriate action.

Usage

es_error_handler(thisCnd)

Arguments

thisCnd

Error condition thrown in the `tryCatch` context

Value

No return value

On this page
